pr_title: [freebox] Hot fix for login to the freebox

timeline.message:
[freebox] Hot fix for login to the freebox

PR #7460 broke the freebox binding

timeline.bodyText: Some of our build tools don't like EOF without a newline. So add a newline here.
timeline.author: cpmeister
